entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Fog patches developing late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High 11 with temperature falling to plus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 11 with temperature falling to plus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
